8. Time

Back to 5 steps
 

datum, de

Date
 

tijd, de

Time

how

laat? /

late

Om

at

hoe

how

laat?

late
At what time?
 

Wanneer?

When?
 

Om

at

vier

four

uur.

hour
At four o’clock
 

Om

at

half

half

twee.

two
At half past one.

it

is

before

five
It’s twenty to six.

it

is

two
